"use client" import { useState } from "react" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" const MarketplacePage = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("all") const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState("newest") const [products] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Premium Maize", price: 3.0, unit: "kg", quantity: "500kg available", seller: "John Farmer", location: "Juba", image: "🌽", category: "grains", rating: 4.8, description: "High-quality yellow maize, freshly harvested", }, { id: 2, name: "Organic Beans", price: 3.5, unit: "kg", quantity: "200kg available", seller: "Mary Agriculture", location: "Yei", image: "🫘", category: "legumes", rating: 4.9, description: "Organic red beans, perfect for cooking", }, { id: 3, name: "Fresh Sorghum", price: 2.8, unit: "kg", quantity: "300kg available", seller: "Peter Farm", location: "Wau", image: "🌾", category: "grains", rating: 4.6, description: "Traditional sorghum variety, drought resistant", }, { id: 4, name: "Groundnuts", price: 4.0, unit: "kg", quantity: "150kg available", seller: "Sarah Cooperative", location: "Juba", image: "🥜", category: "nuts", rating: 4.7, description: "Fresh groundnuts, rich in protein", }, { id: 5, name: "Sweet Potatoes", price: 2.5, unit: "kg", quantity: "400kg available", seller: "David Farm", location: "Yei", image: "🍠", category: "tubers", rating: 4.5, description: "Orange-fleshed sweet potatoes, vitamin A rich", }, { id: 6, name: "Sesame Seeds", price: 5.0, unit: "kg", quantity: "100kg available", seller: "Grace Export", location: "Juba", image: "🌰", category: "seeds", rating: 4.8, description: "Premium sesame seeds for export quality", }, ]) const categories = [ { id: "all", name: "All Products", icon: "🛒" }, { id: "grains", name: "Grains", icon: "🌾" }, { id: "legumes", name: "Legumes", icon: "🫘" }, { id: "nuts", name: "Nuts", icon: "🥜" }, { id: "tubers", name: "Tubers", icon: "🍠" }, { id: "seeds", name: "Seeds", icon: "🌰" }, ] const filteredProducts = products.filter((product) => { const matchesSearch = product.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === "all" || product.category === selectedCategory return matchesSearch && matchesCategory }) const handleOrder = (product) => { alert(`Order placed for ${product.name}! Seller will be contacted.`) } return (
{/* Header */}

Marketplace 🛒

Discover fresh agricultural products from local farmers

{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} style={{ width: "100%", padding: "0.875rem", border: "2px solid #e5e7eb", borderRadius: "10px", fontSize: "1rem", outline: "none", }} />
{/* Categories */}
{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{/* Products Grid */}
{filteredProducts.map((product) => ( ))}
{filteredProducts.length === 0 && (

)}
) } const ProductCard = ({ product, onOrder }) => (
{/* Product Image */}
{product.image}
⭐ {product.rating}
{/* Product Info */}

{product.name}

{product.description}

${product.price}/{product.unit} {product.quantity}
👤 {product.seller} 📍 {product.location}
) export default MarketplacePage
